text:
Great-West Financial | Boston, MA | Full-time | On-site | Front-end Developer

Position will be working on Great-Westâ€™s modern front-end applications. As a Front-end Developer you will be involved in all stages of the project lifecycle from collaborating on requirements, to development, to implementation in production environments. This position is very hands-on and requires a strong ability to adapt to challenging problems and an intense desire to work as part of a cohesive team.

  - Experience in JavaScript and HTML5 / CSS3
  - Experience writing code utilizing a Font-end (MV*) framework (React / AngularJS)
  - Testing experience including unit and e2e testing
Apply here: https://jobs-gwl.icims.com/jobs/15001/developer-web/job
